tool_description: Validates legal documents and intake forms against jurisdictional requirements, ethical standards, and regulatory compliance rules.

document_type.description: Type of document being validated (intake_form, retainer_agreement, contract, etc.)

document_content.description: Content of the document to be validated

practice_area.description: Legal practice area for specific compliance rules

client_type.description: Type of client (individual, corporate, non-profit, etc.)

validation_level.description: Level of validation required (basic, standard, strict)

required_clauses.description: List of specific clauses that must be present

error_messages: Invalid document type: Provide a recognized document type
Unknown jurisdiction: Use a valid legal jurisdiction for compliance checking
Empty document content: Provide the actual document content to validate
Invalid practice area: Specify a valid legal practice area
Invalid client type: Use individual, corporate, non-profit, or other recognized client type
Invalid validation level: Use basic, standard, or strict
Document too large: Document content exceeds maximum size limits
usage: Provide document type, jurisdiction, document content, and practice area. Optionally specify client type, validation level, and required clauses. The tool will check compliance and return validation results.

issues_found.description: List of compliance issues or violations identified

missing_clauses.description: Required clauses that are missing from the document
